    "patch": "@@ -19,7 +19,7 @@ Say goodbye to time-consuming research and the uncertainty of rushed decisions.\n \n \n ## Prerequisites\n-- You must have [Microsoft Entra ID Governance or Microsoft Entra SuiteÂ licenses](licensing-fundamentals.md).\n+- You must have [Microsoft Entra ID Governance or Microsoft Entra SuiteÂ licenses](../id-governance/licensing-fundamentals.md).\n - You must [Onboard to Security Copilot](/copilot/security/get-started-security-copilot#onboarding-to-security-copilot) with at least one [security compute unit (SCU)](/copilot/security/manage-usage) provisioned.\n    - Completing an access review that includes 20 decisions consumes on average 4.5 SCU. This includes the agent gathering insights and generating recommendations and the reviewer's natural language conversation in Microsoft Teams with the agent. The SCU consumption can vary based on the conversation length between the reviewer and agent.\n - Admins must have at least **all** the following roles to set up and manage the agent in the Microsoft Entra admin center:\n@@ -69,8 +69,8 @@ The agents recommendation (approve / deny) for each decision relies on a determi\n \n The agent considers the following signals:\n \n-- **User inactivity**: If the user has [signed in](review-recommendations-access-reviews.md#inactive-user-recommendations)\n-- **User-to-Group affiliation**: If the user has a [low affiliation](review-recommendations-access-reviews.md#user-to-group-affiliation) with other users who have this access\n+- **User inactivity**: If the user has [signed in](../id-governance/review-recommendations-access-reviews.md#inactive-user-recommendations)\n+- **User-to-Group affiliation**: If the user has a [low affiliation](../id-governance/review-recommendations-access-reviews.md#user-to-group-affiliation) with other users who have this access\n - **Account enabled**: If the user's account is enabled (accountEnabled property)\n - **Employment status**: If the user's employment ended ([employeeLeaveDateTime property](/graph/tutorial-lifecycle-workflows-set-employeeleavedatetime))\n - **Lifecycle workflow history**: If the user has had a mover workflow ran for them in the past 30 days\n@@ -229,5 +229,5 @@ The agent responds with this message if your tenant is out of provisioned and ov\n ## Related content\n \n - [Access Review Agent logs and metrics (Preview)](access-review-agent-logs-metrics.md)\n-- [Review recommendations for Access reviews](review-recommendations-access-reviews.md)\n+- [Review recommendations for Access reviews](../id-governance/review-recommendations-access-reviews.md)\n - [Learn more about Microsoft Security Copilot](/copilot/security/microsoft-security-copilot)",

Sign in to the [Microsoft Entra admin center](https://entra.microsoft.com) as at least a [Security Administrator](../role-based-access-control/permissions-reference.md#security-administrator).\n+1. Sign in to the [Microsoft Entra admin center](https://entra.microsoft.com) as at least a [Security Administrator](../identity/role-based-access-control/permissions-reference.md#security-administrator).\n \n 1. Browse to **Conditional Access Optimization Agent**.\n     - Select **Chat with agent** from the agent page to chat with the agent about all policy suggestions.\n     \n-    :::image type=\"content\" source=\"media/agent-optimization-chat/agent-chat-button.png\" alt-text=\"Screenshot of the Conditional Access optimization agent with the Chat with agent button highlighted.\" lightbox=\"media/agent-optimization-chat/agent-chat-button.png\":::\n+    :::image type=\"content\" source=\"media/conditional-access-agent-optimization-chat/agent-chat-button.png\" alt-text=\"Screenshot of the Conditional Access optimization agent with the Chat with agent button highlighted.\" lightbox=\"media/conditional-access-agent-optimization-chat/agent-chat-button.png\":::\n     \n     - Or select **Review suggestion** for any policy suggestion then select **Chat with agent** to chat with the agent about that specific policy suggestion.\n \n-    :::image type=\"content\" source=\"media/agent-optimization-chat/agent-chat-policy-suggestions.png\" alt-text=\"Screenshot of a policy suggestion details page with the Chat with agent button highlighted.\" lightbox=\"media/agent-optimization-chat/agent-chat-policy-suggestions.png\":::\n+    :::image type=\"content\" source=\"media/conditional-access-agent-optimization-chat/agent-chat-policy-suggestions.png\" alt-text=\"Screenshot of a policy suggestion details page with the Chat with agent button highlighted.\" lightbox=\"media/conditional-access-agent-optimization-chat/agent-chat-policy-suggestions.png\":::\n \n 1. Enter a prompt in the chat window using natural language from the supported scenarios in the [What you can do with chat](#what-you-can-do-with-chat) section.\n \n 1. Review the response and apply the recommended changes. For more information, see the [Confirm changes in chat](#confirm-changes-in-chat) section.\n \n-    :::image type=\"content\" source=\"media/agent-optimization-chat/agent-chat-confirm-cancel.png\" alt-text=\"Screenshot of the Conditional Access optimization agent chat with the options to confirm or cancel changes.\" lightbox=\"media/agent-optimization-chat/agent-chat-confirm-cancel.png\":::\n+    :::image type=\"content\" source=\"media/conditional-access-agent-optimization-chat/agent-chat-confirm-cancel.png\" alt-text=\"Screenshot of the Conditional Access optimization agent chat with the options to confirm or cancel changes.\" lightbox=\"media/conditional-access-agent-optimization-chat/agent-chat-confirm-cancel.png\":::\n \n ## Confirm changes in chat\n \n@@ -109,21 +109,21 @@ To illustrate what happens when you confirm a change to an existing policy, let'\n \n In the chat, the agent was asked to exclude any breakglass accounts and it identified five accounts that match.\n \n-:::image type=\"content\" source=\"media/agent-optimization-chat/agent-chat-confirm-closeup.png\" alt-text=\"Screenshot of the Conditional Access optimization agent chat focused on the suggested changes.\" lightbox=\"media/agent-optimization-chat/agent-chat-confirm-closeup.png\":::\n+:::image type=\"content\" source=\"media/conditional-access-agent-optimization-chat/agent-chat-confirm-closeup.png\" alt-text=\"Screenshot of the Conditional Access optimization agent chat focused on the suggested changes.\" lightbox=\"media/conditional-access-agent-optimization-chat/agent-chat-confirm-closeup.png\":::\n \n When you select **Confirm**, the agent makes changes *directly to the policy*. The original suggestion, however, was to add 21 users to the policy. Because we excluded 5 users from the policy update, this suggestion will continue to appear in the recent suggestions lists. Any future agent runs will likely identify the users that we excluded.
